title: Mechanical extractors for smoke-venting system from lower basement levels shall also be provided
clause_text: Mechanical extractors for smoke-venting system from lower basement levels shall also be provided. The system shall be of such design as to operate on actuation of heat sensitive detectors or sprinklers if installed and shall have a considerably higher performance than the
